detail.name: Gildan Adult Heavy Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G5400, 2-Pack
detail.description: Solids: 100% Cotton; Sport Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; Graphite Heather: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester Imported Pull On closure Machine Wash Classic fit for loose comfort Versatile mid-weight fabric for year-round wear Rib cuffs Non-topstitched, classic width, rib collar Tear away label for customizable comfort Screen printing, embroidery, DTG, iron-on transfers, bleaching and tie dye
